shrimp.name: SCurve
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Surface curvature block, based on Mario Marengo's VEX implementation of a surface curvature function, based on Andreas Baerentzen's paper: "On the Computation of the Principal Curvatures of Regular Surfaces". Curvature types are "gauss", for Gaussian curvature; "mean" as the mean of curvatures; "amean" as the absolute mean; "min" and "max" as the minimum and maximum of curvatures. If "greys" = 1.0, then it returns the curvature intensity in greyscale, else, it returns it in color.
